endpoints.description: Retrieve a personalized energy usage report for the user, detailing current trends and areas for improvement.
Submit data to generate tailored recommendations for reducing energy consumption and increasing efficiency.
Obtain predictions of future energy bills based on past and current usage patterns.
Access the distribution details of energy sources utilized, highlighting renewable versus non-renewable contributions.
Provide feedback on received insights, enabling refinement and customization of reported data.
Track the progress towards achieving user-defined energy-saving goals.
Set preferences for customizable alerts related to high usage or anomaly detections.
Retrieve average energy consumption data from similar users within the community for comparison.
Submit user-initiated actions for validation concerning energy-saving effectiveness.
Access a consolidated summary of relevant energy usage information for quick user reference.
